p: Taxonomic comparison of the OTUs identified four main phyla, Firmicutes, Bacteroidetes, Proteobacteria, and Actinobacteria, the most abundant being Firmicutes followed by Bacteroidetes ( Figure 5). Further comparison of genus belonging to these phyla showed that Bacillus was the most abundant genus followed by Paenibacillus, which was followed by Brevibacillus, Planococcus, Flavobacterium, and so forth ( Figure 6).
